title: Strengthening CS Competencies: Sustainable Innovation Projects Through Circular Economy and Collaborative Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Basic economic systems and organizational management experience
context.additional_context: Customer service competency enhancement program for service/customer-facing role practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can analyze the core principles of the circular economy and explain the differences from the traditional linear economic model.
Learners can concretize improvement plans for resource circulation systems within organizations through collaborative learning projects.
Learners can measure sustainability indicators and quantify economic value based on project outcomes.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
